subject: RE: [junit] How to test private methods in a class.
msgSnippet: ... Don t have private methods that need testing. Seriously. But this has been asked so often that a search probably will turn up hundreds of discussions of
messageBody:
junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> hi guys
>
> How to test private methods in a class.

Don't have private methods that need testing. Seriously.

But this has been asked so often that a search probably will turn up
hundreds of discussions of exactly this topic.

Cheers, Ilja
